q1.description: Step 3: The current cell value remains the same and the tape head shifts right one cell, scanning a.
q1.question: What is the current state?

q2.description: Step 5: The current cell value remains the same and the tape head shifts right one cell, scanning c. The current state is q2.
q2.question: After the machine finish reading the entry c, what will happen? Please select all that apply.

q3.description: Step 20: the machine is finished scanning A, it is scanning B now, what will happen?
q3.question: After the machine finish scanning B, what will happen? Please select all that apply.

q4.description: Step 24: The current cell value remains the same and the tape head shifts right one cell, scanning #.
q4.question: After the machine finish reading the entry #, what will be the current state?
